title: Nerima Daikon Brothers
synopsis: In the town of Nerima, the boisterous Hideki and his stoic brother Ichiro run a daikon radish farm along with Mako, their bubbly but vain cousin. The three dream of raising the money needed to build their own concert hall, where their band—Nerima Daikon Brothers—would perform and hopefully rise to stardom. But their farm and Ichiro's host club job aren't raising money fast enough for their liking, leading them to resort to get-rich-quick schemes.
voices: ['Niina, Ayano', 'Morikubo, Shoutarou', 'Matsuzaki, Shigeru', 'Watanabe, Shinichi', 'Inoue, Marina', 'Yuuki, Hiro', 'Inoue, Kazuhiko', 'Sakamoto, Chika', 'Matsuki, Miyu']
staff: [['Watanabe, Shinichi', ['Director']], ['Ebina, Yasunori', ['Sound Director']], ['Saito, Noriaki', ['Episode Director', ' Key Animation']], ['Matsuura, Johei', ['Episode Director']]]
